name: Set Off Fireworks Together
description:
Welcome all players to come to the fireworks game together.

With global warming, policies banning fireworks have been gradually introduced around the world, which has made many people lose great fun.

Especially during the New Year's holiday, I lost fireworks and lost the joy of the festival.

Now, you can set off fireworks in the game to your heart's content, no restrictions, no policies, create as much as you want, experience the pleasure brought by fireworks, and rediscover the taste that belongs to us!
